round_best: Develop an AI-driven platform that utilizes a generative adversarial network (GAN) to simulate the evolution of antibody sequences. This platform would pit generated antibodies against a set of evolving virtual antigens, mimicking real biological arms races. This approach would allow researchers to observe how antibody mutations might fare against evolving pathogens in a computationally efficient and cost-effective manner, thereby predicting more viable antibody candidates for further experimental validation.
